name: Properbounce Technologies
tag_list: web-design-company, web-development-company, website-design-services, website-development-services, ecommerce-web-development, web-service-company, web-solutions-company
overview:
Properbounce Technologies is an India based offshore IT outsource company providing high-end yet affordable website design and development services to clients worldwide.

We offer services like custom web designing, Web 2.0 site development, Rich Internet Application (RIA) development, Graphic & Print Media designing, Flash web site designing, website maintenance and website redesigning.

The enterprise was created by MR. Amit Bhattacharya in the late 2007. He worked at several web design and development outsourcing companies as a web developer. Heâ€™s got more than 10 years of relevant industry experience. The company became operational in mid 2008 with 5 employees and with meager amount of international projects.

Today Properbounce Technologies employ more than 25 experienced IT professionals and looking forward to expand it further for our ever increasing number of international/domestic website design and development Projects. The technologies used here to deliver custom website development service are Open Source like Joomla, WordPress, PHP MySQL and Jquery.

We are also specialized in Flash and HTML/XHTML web design, Shopping cart design/development for Ecommerce website development, Text/Video Chat application development, Custom Administration (Admin) Panel, OS Commerce Customization and much more.

Apart from custom website development service, we also offer Professional Graphic Designing Services. We named it Corporate Identity and Branding Service. The services we offer here are Logo/Illustration Design, Email Newsletter design, creative brochure design to clients, Flash/Animated Logo Design, Business card design, E Book design and corporate presentation.

We provide innovative yet cost effective web services and solutions to almost every industry such as Travel and Hospitality, Law, Finance & Insurance, Beauty, Corporate, Media/Television/Advertising, Automotive Sector, Education, Healthcare, Real Estate and many more.
